artist: Designer: Jack Larsen; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Blue dominates. Plain weave or Twill variation. Similar to Pomegranate. Light and medum shades of blue and green warp and weft. Plain weave variation. Right Selvedge.
